Author: Aireil
Name: FF Logs Viewer
Description: View FF Logs ranking percentiles in-game. Add a context menu to open someone's logs. Layout, style, stats, default metric, and more are all customizable in the settings.
Punchline: View FF Logs ranking percentiles in-game.
Changelog:
- 2.1.5.2:
   Add current job feature to the job selection (default for all or current can be set in Configuration -> Stats).
- 2.1.5.1:
   Attempt to fix party view shaking under certain circumstances.
   Remove Penumbra IPC (no longer needed).
